p: Breast cancer is the most familiar cancer and the major cause of the cancer death in women worldwide. [ 14, 15] The breast cancer patients may suffer from severe mental and physical trauma, involving damaged body images, the loss of breasts, insomnia, fatigue, pain, depression, as well as other negative emotions. [ 16] These traumas may have a negative impact on the long-term life quality in the survivors of breast cancer. Medication and surgery may be effective, but there may be secondary effects and side effects, resulting in some negative psychological impacts. [ 17]
